channel.title: Beef on Karl's Blog

item.title: More Jerky!
item.author: kc0bfv@notmet.net (Karl Sickendick)
item.description: Alright, time for more beef jerky. This time I found top round roast for $3.99 per pound. I’m using the same recipe as last time, but it’s 3.5 lbs so I multiplied the marinade by about 1.5. I sliced the meat more along the grain than last time, and also slightly thicker. 1530: Meat is in the marinade. 1020 Sunday: Meat is on the smoker, 175â„‰, vents half open this time cause why not, that’s what I normally do.
